name: Blinkbeard
description:
Download the game if you are up to the sweet controller rumble 🎮 !!! Windows Laptop Users !!!
Godot Engine has a frame rate issue with the Battery Saver on Windows laptops.
Consider playing the game while your laptop is connected to a charger.

Made in 48 hours.

Pirate Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish 2020  entry.

You can rate here.

Design and Programming by Yongmin Park

Soundtrack by OkamiDeluxe (source)

[Controls]

Xbox Controller:
- Movement: Left Stick
- Jump: A
- Attack: X (Can aim in 8 direction with Left stick)
- Throw: B (Can aim)
- Blink: (When the sword is in the air) B

Keyboard:
- Movement: Arrow keys
- Jump: Z
- Attack: X
- Throw: C
- Blink: (When the sword is in the air) C

Will add more details including full credits, gameplay descriptions etc.
